revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Memorial Hill |image = [[File:Memorial Hill.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Memorial Hill. |tokens = 950,000 |location = West of Akala Outskirts/East of Route 9. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Memorial Hill''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 13,286,024 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Preschooler_(male).png|40px]] Preschooler Liam || [[File:Magby.png|40px]] Magby, [[File:Ledian.png|40px]] Ledian |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly || [[File:Gentleman.png|40px]] Gentleman Smith || [[File:Jolteon.png|40px]] Jolteon |- | [[File:Phantump.png|40px]] Phantump || [[File:Madame.png|40px]] Madame Sayuri || [[File:Furfrou.png|40px]] Furfrou, [[File:Comfey.png|40px]] Comfey |- | [[File:Xurkitree.png|40px]] '''Xurkitree*''' || [[File:Punk Girl.png|40px]] Punk Girl Melissa || [[File:Ariados.png|40px]] Ariados |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Note:''' Must be unlocked by doing [[Quests#Ultra Beast Hunt|Ultra Beast Hunt]] Quest first.
<!--T:7--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | colspan=2|<center>N/A|| [[File:Team Skull Grunt (male).png|50px]] Team Skull Grunt || [[File:Alolan Raticate.png|50px]] Alolan Raticate || <center>66,430,120 |- |}
